meanings: [명사] plan (for), program, scheme, (의도) design, [동사] plan, make[devise, work out, draw up] a plan (for), (세세하게) map out
a plan for the mass production

vlive.korean: [추억에 잠긴 나연이] 방학 계획 세울 때! [Reminiscing about the past] I used it to plan my vacation! 듣기 View video Dispatch : [Dicon] "나연’s Special Day" (디아이콘 : 트와이스)
vlive.english: [Reminiscing about the past] I used it to plan my vacation!

vlive.korean: 계획한 대로만 하면 1등, 2등 정도 알지? - 가능합니까? If it goes our way, 1st or 2nd place. - Is it really possible? 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 23. 현재 1위 츄플에게 도전하는 경희대 래빈 & 용인 리퍼블릭!
vlive.english: If it goes our way, 1st or 2nd place. - Is it really possible?

vlive.korean: [생일 끝나고 새로운 재밌는 계획 이쏘?] 생일 끝나고 새로운 재밌는 계획 있냐고요? [Do you have fun plans after your birthday?] Do I have any fun plans? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [BTS] 공공칠빵 소시지빵은 가라 호석오빵의 시대가 왔노라니,,🍞 (HAPPY J-HOPE DAY+1!)
vlive.english: [Do you have fun plans after your birthday?] Do I have any fun plans?
